name: BreakPong (Tank King)
description:
A combination of 2 popular arcade games - Breakout and Pong, this game tries to add a unique twist to the concept. Made for the Mini Jam - Darkness. You can play the browser version of the game made in HTML & Javascript.

Also, you can check out the downloadable executable made using pygame in python. If you do not trust the exe file, then you can run the game from source itself!

The controls are as follows:

ActionControl AControl BRightRight ArrowDLeftLeft ArrowASelectReturnEnter
